verbose_text: In E. coli, LexA regulates expression of the translesion DNA polymerase (Pol) II (encoded by polB), Pol IV (dinB), and Pol V (umuDC) that allow DNA replication through sites of damage that cannot be bypassed by replicative DNA Pol III.
evidence: Pol V (umuDC) that allow DNA replication through sites of damage that cannot be bypassed by replicative DNA Pol III
